7.Pros: Half off of anything not on the dollar menu, free food if you came in early/stay late (which was usually every day because people were always calling out or not showing up with no repercussions), on holidays you got to wear a regular t-shirt with work pants and shoes.
7.Cons: Horrible working conditions, everything was always breaking and filthy, store manager was rude and belittled you almost every day, customers were rude, nothing was properly cleaned until a week before an inspection, served expired/past serve time food to customers (they would just put new time stickers on the items), other expired food is given to employees, doesn't enforce cleanliness (employees wiping their face/nose then handling food. Usually with no gloves).
